Name: Counter-Strike
About the game: Play the world's number 1 online action game. Engage in an incredibly realistic brand of terrorist warfare in this wildly popular team-based game. Ally with teammates to complete strategic missions. Take out enemy sites. Rescue hostages. Your role affects your team's success. Your team's success affects your role.
Meta Title: Counter-Strike: Nov 1, 2000, Valve and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Counter-Strike? Check out the release date (Nov 1, 2000), developer insights from Valve, and a complete game summary.
